title: Happy White Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Ah, Chika. Just because we just had practice doesn’t mean it’s okay to eat that many sweets before dinner.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ehehe, you found me~. Riko-chan and You-chan gave me these today. They said it’s for White Day.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Then that’s all the more reason to hold back on eating them, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Okay~. I’ll make this one my last~. *Munch*. Hnn~, so good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Geez. You really are a shrewd one~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Does that mean I’m smart?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>It does not! *Sigh*. Oh well. Anyway, I also forgot to give you these. Here, take it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You gave me some cookies for White Day earlier, remember? Here’s something in return. I guess we all ended up giving each other something both on Valentine’s and White Day, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Waaah, thank you! Giving sweets to each other is fun~! All the ones you get from other people taste 10 times as good, after all! With that said, can I please eat just one of these, Kanan-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
